LanguageData.ATR_PartPack.label: Make a mechanical part pack
LanguageData.ATR_PartPack.description: Create a pack of half-assembled parts designed to replace standard components ranging from whole legs and arms to intricate batteries and adaptors. Programmed mechanites shape themselves to fit more complicated tasks.
LanguageData.ATR_MakeAIPersonaCore.label: Make an AI persona core
LanguageData.ATR_MakeAIPersonaCore.description: Create a complexe AI core capable of sentience.
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidResurrectorKit.label: Make an android resurrector kit
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidResurrectorKit.description: Create a specialized kit of tools capable of reviving offline mechanical units to full functionality. The process of reactivating a deceased unit can be exceedingly expensive due to the inherent difficulties of restoring a deceased intelligence.
LanguageData.ATR_DroneResurrectorKit.label: Make a drone resurrector kit
LanguageData.ATR_DroneResurrectorKit.description: Create a specialized suite of tools capable of bringing disabled simple mechanical drones back to life. The tools are sufficiently advanced to bring simple-minded mechanical units like animals back to life. Revived units must fully reboot in order to begin operating again.
